author: RTÉ News
title: China to lift travel curbs on Hubei province
description: China has announced that a lockdown would be lifted on more than 50 million people in central Hubei province where the coronavirus first emerged late last year.
content:
China has announced that a lockdown would be lifted on more than 50 million people in central Hubei province where the coronavirus first emerged late last year.
But fears rose over a second wave of infections fuelled by people arriving from overseas.
After … [+2268 chars]
